evidence.claim: HeartBeatFam integrates with FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
The company implements HIPAA compliance protocols to secure health information.
HL7 standards are utilized for integrating diverse healthcare applications.
The platform claims to support EDI transactions, aligning with HIPAA requirements.
Development roles highlight experience with secure data handling in accordance with healthcare regulations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse services found.
